exceptions.exn: In environment n : ill_vars s : ill_vars -> vec ill_vars n -> Prop X1, X2, Y1, Y2 : vec ill_vars n -> Prop H1 : forall x : vec ill_vars n, X1 x -> X2 x H2 : forall x : vec ill_vars n, Y1 x -> Y2 x x, x1, x2 : vec ill_vars n Hx : x = vec_plus x1 x2 Hx1 : X1 x1 Hx2 : Y1 x2 Unable to unify "Prop" with "(X2 ** Y2) x".

In environment n : ill_vars P : (vec ill_vars n -> Prop) -> (vec ill_vars n -> Prop) -> vec ill_vars n -> Prop X1, X2, Y1, Y2 : vec ill_vars n -> Prop H1 : forall x : vec ill_vars n, X1 x -> X2 x H2 : forall x : vec ill_vars n, Y1 x -> Y2 x x1, x2 : vec ill_vars n Hx1 : X1 x1 Hx2 : Y1 x2 X0, X3, X4, X5, X6 : Prop Unable to unify "X2 ?M2679" with "P X2 Y2 (vec_plus x1 x2)".

In environment n : ill_vars P : (vec ill_vars n -> Prop) -> (vec ill_vars n -> Prop) -> vec ill_vars n -> Prop X1, X2, Y1, Y2 : vec ill_vars n -> Prop H1 : forall x : vec ill_vars n, X1 x -> X2 x H2 : forall x : vec ill_vars n, Y1 x -> Y2 x x1, x2 : vec ill_vars n Hx1 : X1 x1 Hx2 : Y1 x2 X0, X3, X4, X5, X6, X7 : Prop Unable to unify "Y2 ?M2920" with "P X2 Y2 (vec_plus x1 x2)".

original: intros H1 H2 x [x1 [x2 [Hx [Hx1 Hx2]]]]. apply ill_tps_mult. exists x1. exists x2. split. auto. split. - apply H1. auto. - apply H2. auto.
